UpdateGroupID.description: The UpdateType in which clients must be for the report to include them.

bundleNumber.description: Optional. Tells us which chart to show based upon filter.

$block: Model that retrieves the data for UpdateMetrics

$ul: **ActiveVersion**: Active version (bundle number) of update type.
**ActiveVersionByClient**: Generic collection that is of type ActiveVersionByClientRecord
**CurrentStateByClient**: Generic collection that is of type CurrentStateByClientRecord
**CutOffDate**: Date that has been configured to only show the most recent clients with a cut off date. (Ex. year from current date)
**DataRefreshed**: Data was refreshed at this time.
**PackageErrors**: Generic collection that is of type PackageErrorsRecord
**TotalClientCount**: Total clients we have ever serviced
